newReleases.description: Oshi No Ko is a supernatural mystery set within the entertainment and idol industry, Vivy tells the story of an AI songstress.

newReleases.description: Awakened into a world where humanity has been petrified, scientific genius Senku and his brawny friend Taiju.

actions.title: Naruto
actions.description: It tells the story of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage.

actions.description: In 1960s Japan, a thief's rebellious grandson and a gun-toting delinquent meet for the first time.

actions.description: A girl and her robot companion search for her mother, who's lost within a vast chasm.

actions.title: Overlord IV

actions.title: DOTA 2
actions.description: two teams of five players compete to destroy a large structure defended by the opposing team.

actions.title: Goblin Slayer
actions.description: In a fantasy world, a lone hero makes his living by exterminating all goblins he encounters.

romance.title: Horimiya

romance.title: Date A Live
romance.description: A boy named Itsuka Shido meets a spirit girl who has been rejected by a devastated world. The girl, who Shido names Tohka.

romance.title: Romantic Killer
romance.description: High schooler Anzu Hoshino has a great life. Every day she plays video games, pigs out on snacks, and pets her beloved cat.

romance.title: Scum's Wish
romance.description: A perfect couple struggles with a secret longing each has for someone else.

upcoming.description: In Japan, monsters known as kaiju regularly attack the populace with the Japanese Defense Force tasked with killing them.
